course_title: Practicum 2:  Exploring Markets, Ethics, Sales and Trading
course_description: This course utilizes the Finance Lab with an action-based workstream exploring the 24/7 pace of global trading products and how they work.Â  Levering current market conditions, students source and pitch trading ideas in accordance with best practices of ethics and values. Students will start to build an actively managed investment vehicle in compliance with current financial regulations.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the MAF program.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4866, Section #: 4201, Type: PRA, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 9:30a-12p, Instructor: K. Travers-Uyham, Status: Closed
